sentences.english: Midcom is the world's top producer of telecommunications transformers.
sentences.chinese: 明康是世界级的通讯变压器生产商。

sentences.english: The Cullinan rising at West Kowloon waterfront with world-class design and prestige.
sentences.chinese: 天玺矗立西九龙海畔，世界级设计尽显尊尚气派。

sentences.english: Vincent Ip Ting Pong is a world-class problem-solver.
sentences.chinese: 叶定邦是一位世界级的排疑解难高手。

sentences.english: Elite is currently the most advanced world-class purpose built fireboat .
sentences.chinese: 此船是现时最先进的世界级专业灭火轮之一。

sentences.english: I don't see many other world class left-backs available.
sentences.chinese: 我想不到比他更适合这个位置的世界级左后卫人选。

sentences.english: This large amount of people helped turn Taipei into a world-class city.
sentences.chinese: 大量的人口帮助台北转变成世界级的城市。

sentences.english: As the world-class golf villa, Yunling's outstanding quality is impressive.
sentences.chinese: 作为世界级的高尔夫别墅，云岭的优异品质令人惊叹。

sentences.english: Sir Alex is right, Berba can do the things that make you think 'that's world class.
sentences.chinese: 爵爷是对的，贝巴能做到一些世界级的事情。

sentences.english: The shopping and dining areas are home to numerous world-famous brands and chefs.
sentences.chinese: 购物餐饮区域汇集了为数众多的世界级品牌和厨师。

sentences.english: Mumbai's globalized class hungers for it to be a world city.
sentences.chinese: 孟买的全球化阶层渴望这里成为世界级都市。

sentences.english: Professor Quelch is a world-class expert and an excellent presenter.
sentences.chinese: 奎尔奇教授是世界级的专家和杰出的演说家。

sentences.english: How many world-class music bands have you found by 20?
sentences.chinese: 你20岁的时候建立了多少个世界级的乐队？

sentences.english: From my perspective, Zhang’s fault lies in her unique role, a world-famous star.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，章子怡错就错在她是一个世界级的影星。

sentences.english: It is because they understand that it is no easy thing to cultivae a world-famous star.
sentences.chinese: 因为他们明白，要出一个世界级影星不容易。

sentences.english: The world-class IDM (Integrated Devicd Manufacturer) companies should optimize their resources attraction instead of investing too much.
sentences.chinese: 世界级的IDM公司应该要最佳化资源投入组合，。

sentences.english: Our city has a number of world-class hotels with high standard of services.
sentences.chinese: 本市有不少世界级的宾馆，提供高标准的服务。

definition: peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
ranked number one in the world/the world's first
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
